channel.title: How Do I Edit My Server?
channel.description: I created my server and when i log on I'm under varrock I want to change that and add things to my server. How do I do that?

item.title: How Do I Edit My Server?
item.dc:creator: @solargreg5 solargreg5
item.description:
@solargreg5 wrote:

you can go to ur cfg files click open with then select open using a program click on the notepad file and u can edit using that. Stuff like autospawn shops the npc drops and so on.
if you need help chainging that stuff i suggest u look for guides

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Edit My Server?
item.dc:creator: @solargreg5 solargreg5
item.description:
@solargreg5 wrote:

go to client notepad then press cntrl f and search the name of the source u have downloaded and change it to your servers name

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Edit My Server?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

lamarlc2:

I created my server and when i log on I’m under varrock I want to change that and add things to my server. How do I do that?

Everyone, before the flaming starts about the wrong section, hes a first time poster.

lamarlc2, post this question in the section RS2 Server Development/Help or RS2 Server Tutorials to get replies on how to do this. I will help you out once you have done so.

Read full topic
